notesStmt.note: Attributed to Andrew Marvell. Cf. Margoliouth, H.M. Poems & letters of Andrew Marvell, 1952, I, 289.
Place and date of publication from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
A number of contemporary works had similar titles; these works and their authorship are widely confused.
Also published as: Further instructions to a painter.
Presumably written in 1671 but not published until the period of the Popish Plot.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
